text: Bill Murray fronted a hilarious, empowering West Side Story medley on Thursday ’ s Late Show alongside his recent musical collaborator, German cellist Jan Vogler. The performance, which capped off a zany late - night takeover, included spoken word / classical renditions of Sondheim - Bernstein classics “ Somewhere, ” “ I Feel Pretty ” and “ America. ” Murray opened the mini - set in lounge crooner mode, theatrically smirking and wandering around the stage to a soundtrack of sawing strings and stomping piano. The actor drastic utilized tonal shifts for comedic effect, moving from the drama of “ Somewhere ” to the silliness of “ I Feel Pretty ” – the latter earning audience chuckles as Murray sashayed across the stage.
